{"step_by_step_thinking": "The maxillary teeth are generally easier to anesthetize than the mandibular teeth due to the porous nature of the maxillary bone which allows for easy diffusion of the anesthetic solution. However, among the maxillary teeth, the first molar can be more difficult to anesthetize due to the presence of the zygomatic process of the maxilla, which can block the diffusion of the anesthetic.", "answer_choice": "A. 1st molar"}
